ProductInfo.Features:
GW9204HDSDI: HD-SDI High Definition 4 Channel Plug & Play DVR, 1080P realtime preview, 1CH 1080P realtime playback, support E-SATA.  4 alarm in/1 out. iPhone, Android Viewing. HDMI & VGA. Playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW788HDSDI: Professional 1/3" 2.1 Megapixel CMOS Camera, Progressive Scan, 1080P Video Output Mode, HD-SDIVideo Output Level, Vari-Focal 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens, 72PCs IR LED. Vandal proof & water proof
GW158HDSDI: HD-SDI 1/3" 2.1 Megapixel CMOS Camera, Progressive Scan, 1080P Video Output Mode, HD-SDIVideo Output Level, 8mm Lens, 2 Array IR Leds. Vandal proof & water proof
Package Includes:GW9204HDSDI DVR with 2TB HD; GW190  - Free CCTV 19" LED monitor; GWZG10 - Free 3 feet 1.4V HDMI Male - Male Cable; 1 x GW788HDSDI -1/3" 2.1 Megapixel CMOS Outdoor Camera; 1 x GW158HDSDI -1/3" 2.1 Megapixel CMOS Outdoor Camera;
1 x GW500RG59: 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable; 2 x GW12V1A: 12V1A Power Supply for Security Cameras; 2 x Male Power pigtail (GW082); 2 x Female Power pigtail (GW132); 4 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 2CHH3 High Definition 4 Channel HD DVR with 2 x HD-SDI 2.1 Megapixel 1080P Video Output Security Camera System, Free LED Monitor (Black/White)
